subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
; Etymology 1
: {{Han compound|虫|隹|ls=psc|c1=s|c2=p|t1=insect; crawling creature}}.
; Etymology 2
: {{Han compound|虫|隹|ls=psc|c1=p|c2=s|t2=bird|no_och=1}}.

subSections.title: Etymology 1
subSections.text:
Compare {{cog|mkh-pro|*srjuul||gibbon}} ({{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}).

{{zh-ref|Matisoff (1995)}} suggests that it is {{och-l|猶|a kind of monkey|id=2}} + palatal diminutive suffix.

subSections.title: Definitions
